title: The Upturned Glass (1947, UK) James Mason, Pamela Kellino - Film Noir

sources.title: The Upturned Glass (1947, UK) James Mason, Pamela Kellino - Film Noir
sources.description: The Upturned Glass is a 1947 British film noir psychological thriller directed by Lawrence Huntington and starring James Mason, Rosamund John and Pamela Kellino. It was made at Gainsborough Pictures' Islington Studios, with sets designed by the art director Andrew Mazzei. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Upturned_Glass Suggested British Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/3aMND3W The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
